text: yahaan tak ke jab hamara hukm aa pahoncha aur tannuur3 ubalne laga, hum ne kaha ke, is kashti mein har qism ke (jaandaaro mein se) jode (yani) do (jaanwar, ek nar aur ek maada) sawaar karaale, aur apne ghar ke logo ko bhi sivae un ke jin par pehle se baath pad chuki hai aur sub iman walo ko bhi, us ke saath iman lane wale bahuth hee kam thein
